black_cards.text: The quarterly team building exercise was ruined by _______.
What's the real reason the printer isn't working___?
The new office policy states that _______ is now mandatory during meetings.
Our startup's new product combines _______ with _______.
Why did the IT department disappear for three hours___?
The secret to a successful presentation is _______ and _______.
What's really in the break room fridge___?
The new employee handbook specifically prohibits _______.
Today's motivational poster: _______ leads to success!
The real reason for missing the deadline was _______ and _______.
In a shocking twist, scientists discovered that _______ is the cure for boredom.
My new hobby combines _______ with _______.
What's the secret ingredient in grandma's cookies___?
The local museum's newest exhibit features _______.
I tried to learn a new skill but got distracted by _______.
My GPS rerouted me because of _______ on the highway.
The secret to winning any game show is _______ and _______.
My neighbor's unusual collection of _______ has won several awards.
The weather forecast predicts a 90% chance of _______.
According to Pinterest, you can fix anything with _______ and _______.
My attempt at a world record was ruined by _______.
The secret to viral TikTok fame is _______ with _______.
What's really inside those mystery flavor airheads___?
My new self-help book is titled: '_______ Your Way to Success'.
I would have won MasterChef if it weren't for _______.
The zoo's newest attraction combines _______ with _______.
My smart home assistant keeps suggesting _______.
The secret ingredient in this energy drink is _______.
My cat's strange obsession with _______ has gone too far.
The next Olympic sport will combine _______ and _______.
What's causing that strange noise in the attic___?
My autobiography will be titled: 'A Life of _______ '.
The food truck's fusion menu features _______ with _______.
My plant died because I gave it too much _______.
The weirdest thing found in lost and found was _______.
My meditation app now includes guided _______ sessions.
The reason this flight is delayed: _______.
My robot vacuum has developed a fear of _______.
The secret to a perfect sandwich is _______ and _______.
I failed my driving test because of _______.
My new podcast is just three hours of _______.
The fortune cookie said _______ leads to _______.
The trending hashtag #_______ took over Twitter.
My virtual background accidentally revealed _______.
The reason I was late to the party: _______.

white_cards.text: The office plant that won't die
That one person who microwaves fish
The ancient version of Internet Explorer
That one spatula that everyone fights over
A flash mob of confused penguins
A roomba that only moves in reverse
Charging five devices with one outlet
Getting directions from a confused pigeon
Knitting a sweater for a tree
Learning TikTok dances from your grandma
Making eye contact with a painting
Organizing your sock drawer by smell
Reading the entire terms and conditions
Singing in the shower with autotune
Using interpretive dance in a presentation
